meanings.definition: A condition in which the pituitary gland does not produce enough hormones.
meanings.sent1: Hypopituitarism can cause various health issues due to hormone deficiency.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed her with hypopituitarism after noticing hormone imbalances.
meanings.sent3: When the pituitary gland decides to take a break, hypopituitarism steps in for the job!
meanings.sent4: In the body's orchestra, hypopituitarism plays the role of the missing conductor.
meanings.sent5: The silent pituitary gland whispered tales of hypopituitarism's arrival.

meanings.definition: The underproduction of hormones by the pituitary gland.
meanings.sent1: Severe hypopituitarism can lead to serious health complications.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that hypopituitarism was the cause of her fatigue.
meanings.sent3: Hypopituitarism decided to throw a party and invite all the other underproducing glands!
meanings.sent4: In the land of hormones, hypopituitarism was the quiet underproducer.
meanings.sent5: The pituitary gland's whisper echoed with the sound of hypopituitarism.
